meanings.definition: A salt or ester of hypochlorous acid.
meanings.sent1: I used hypochlorite to clean the pool.
meanings.sent2: The hypochlorite solution effectively removed the stains.
meanings.sent3: The hypochlorite decided to take a bath in the pool.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as hypochlorite on a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The smell of hypochlorite lingered in the air after cleaning.

meanings.definition: A compound containing the anion ClO-.
meanings.sent1: The hypochlorite compound is commonly used in disinfectants.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to handle hypochlorite compounds with care.
meanings.sent3: The hypochlorite compound threw a party with the chlorine ion.
meanings.sent4: His words were like hypochlorite, cleansing the situation.
meanings.sent5: The hypochlorite compound glowed under the UV light.
